name: HomeRemedies
0:
”Alexa open home remedies”
”Alexa ask home remedies that i am having cold”
”do you have remedies for skin tanning?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: home remedies
des:
This skill will help you in getting suggestions for your problems or troubles. They are general Home remedies designed to help you with ideas on how you can use small things easily available in your home to resolve problems that sometimes create big troubles. 

these remedies are just to provide a first step of problem resolution, before you reach doctor.

Disclaimer :- THE INFORMATION IN THIS SKILL IS PROVIDED FOR INFORMATIONAL AND EDUCATIONAL PURPOSE ONLY. ALL RECOMMENDATIONS ARE MADE WITHOUT GUARANTEE. THE INFORMATION COLLECTED IS DONE GLOBALLY FROM MULTIPLE SOURCES, IT IS SUGGESTED TO KEEP A CHECK ON YOUR ALLERGIES BEFORE TRYING REMEDIES. 

YOU SHOULD NOT USE THE INFORMATION OR SERVICE ON THIS SKILL TO DIAGNOSE OR TREAT ANY HEALTH ISSUES OR FOR PRESCRIPTION OF ANY MEDICATION OR OTHER TREATMENT. YOU SHOULD ALWAYS CONSULT WITH YOUR HEALTH CARE PROFESSIONAL .

TRY ALL THE SUGGESTED REMEDIES WITH YOUR CHOICE, WE ARE NOT ACCOUNTABLE IF ANYTHING DOES NOT PROVIDE BENEFIT OR CAUSE ANY HARM.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
